title: Coronavirus update: Fears UK hospitals may run out of PPE, Trump estimates 65,000 US deaths
description: Hospital staff in the UK are told to reuse equipment and go without protective gowns as the public pay tribute to their work, US President Donald Trump tips up to 65,000 Americans will die and athletes banned for doping until 2020 get a break to compete at th…
content:
Updated 
April 18, 2020 15:06:44
Hospital staff in the United Kingdom have been told to reuse equipment and to go without full-length protective gowns as fears mount about the nation's supplies.
Meanwhile, US President Donald Trump, who continues to be und… [+15752 chars]
